projects.title: Mon Vieux Grimoire
projects.description: Library web application for book referencing and rating
projectDescription: I designed the back-end part by creating an Express server, configuring the database, and developing the API.
I implemented features such as secure authentication, user file management using middlewares, and evaluation management.

projects.title: Nina Carducci Portfolio
projectDescription: I conducted a performance assessment using Lighthouse and GTMetrix, identifying areas for optimization, such as reducing image size and loading times, and code minification.
I also implemented local SEO (schema.org), improved the semantic content and debugged the gallery.
